description: Create a broker-vendor trading partner relationship.
permissions: Allowed when the user can see both the organization and partner and is an admin, a broker branch member, or an organization manager per TradingPartnerPolicy.
side_effects: Creates a broker-vendor trading partner relationship.
validation_notes: --broker and --vendor are required. --vendor must be in Type|ID format and only supports Trucker or MaterialSite types. Organization and partner relationships are required by the TradingPartner model.

flags.name: --vendor
flags.description: Vendor in Type|ID format (Trucker or MaterialSite)
flags.validation: Type|ID format; supported types: Trucker, MaterialSite
